wiki.text:
'RCI' may refer to one of the following.

*Radio Canada International *Radio Caraïbes International, a radio station in
Martinique and Guadeloupe *Radio Caribbean International, a radio station in St.
Lucia *RCI, a Timeshare Exchange Company *Revival Centres International, an
Australian Pentecostal church *Royal Canadian Institute, an organization
dedicated to the advancement of science. *Royal Caribbean International, a
shipping company, Florida, USA *Roadway Characteristics Inventory, a database
containing information on roads *Rogers Communications Inc., a Canadian
communications company *Racer's Choice Inc., a manufacturer of racing automotive
products, Texas, USA *Rapid Continuous Improvement, a process improvement
practice based on the Japanese concept of Kaizen *Research Centre Imarat, an
Indian defence laboratory under DRDO responsible for the development of
missiles. (See [[IGMDP]]) *Riverside College, Inc., a medical college in the
Philippines
